column1: More than 1,300 tragic coronavirus deaths in the last 4 days. The infection rate is up 30% in the South West. The R rate is above 1 in some towns and cities. I’m afraid to say, Boris Johnson & Dominic Cummings are heinous, negligent, & plain fucking dangerous
You left Brits caught up in the Coronavirus outbreak to swing worse than any other country in the World did its citizens. #CallousJohnsonhttps://twitter.com/BorisJohnson/status/1229764786172416001 …
